issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a mobile web application
2. Run in browser
3. Tail the logs for analytics
4. Start the application
5. Refresh to reload the application

Actual:
The two start events has the same session id

Expected:
The two start events should have different session id

Note:
The sequence number for End is 0 instead of the last incremented number from the previous session
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Analytic is not creating a new session id for new sessions
